name: Duloga
description:
Duloga is a reverse space shooter where you choose who lives and dies.
Can You Survive 7 Nights?

FEATURING...

  • Seven full levels. Can you SURVIVE all of them?
  • State-of-the-art RGB COLORS!
  • GUIDE a crowd to weed out criminals!
  • High resolution 8-BIT GRAPHICS!
  • Help COPS meet their quota!
  • CHOOSE who deserves to die.


    Duloga is a game about our struggle against police brutality, extrajudicial killings, red-tagging, and state terrorism in the Philippines.
